comments:
I20060322-1335 SDK build.

I was importing a project set of about 300 projects when most of the projects already exist in my workspace and come from the "webtools" repository, which does not have a flat plugin folder structure like the "eclipse" repository.  It's not consistent, but there's a stack overflow updating the CVS Repositories view during the operation and the Error makes the entire view blank until I restart the workbench.  The error isn't visible to the user since the only immediate effect I can see is that the yes/no dialog does not open at all.  The import wizard looks instead like it just sat there for 5 minutes eating CPU cycles then reenabled the Finish button.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-03-27 17:03:54.950
!MESSAGE Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.StackOverflowError)
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.StackOverflowError)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3374)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.syncExec(Display.java:3761)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.dialogs.MultipleYesNoPrompter.confirmOverwrite(MultipleYesNoPrompter.java:98)

	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.ProjectSetImporter.importProjectSet(ProjectSetImporter.java:84)

	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:101)

	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:113)
